name: Penne Pesto Pasta Salad
author: truRoots(R)
summary: Penne pasta is tossed with basil pesto, mozzarella pearls, cherry tomatoes, Parmesan cheese, and black olives for a colorful and delicious pasta salad.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package truRoots® Ancient Grains Organic Penne
½ cup prepared fresh basil pesto
1 pint grape or cherry tomatoes, halved
1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
4 sprigs Fresh basil sprigs, for garnish
directions: Cook pasta in large pot of boiling salted water, just until al dente, about 7 to 9 minutes
Combine pasta and pesto in large bowl
Stir in mozzarella, tomatoes, Parmesan and olives
Serve garnished with basil sprigs, if desired
